Command: /ranks remove @s neophyte
/ranks add @s novice
/me just ranked up! They're now a Novice!
/tellraw @s ["",{"text":"You can now set 3 /home, claim 15 chunks and chunkload 5 of them.","color":"gold"}]
/tellraw @s ["",{"text":"You can self-assign your Discord rank in the #roles channel.","color":"gold"}]
